indicator_name: Foreign direct investments (FDI), official development assistance and South-South Cooperation as a proportion of gross national income (GNI)
target_name: 개도국을 위해 다양한 출처로부터 추가적인 재원 동원

page_content: ▶ Data type: National data (Type1) This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators. Download the national metadata file for more information.
title: Foreign direct investments (FDI), official development assistance and South-South Cooperation as a proportion of total domestic budget
target: Mobilize additional financial resources for developing countries from multiple sources
